name: Ikelos, the Dream Mirror Sprite
text: If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Dream Mirror" monster: You can add 1 "Dream Mirror" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Ikelos, the Dream Mirror Sprite". During the Main or Battle Phase, if "Dream Mirror of Terror" is in a Field Zone (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Ikelos, the Dream Mirror Mara" from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Ikelos, the Dream Mirror Sprite" once per turn.
